attributes.action: Abolish the target driven culture of the NHS that  is harming patients with long term illnesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: government policy has been disasterous for the NHS. Money has been siphoned off into management consultant and independant treatment centres, leaving core services underfunded.  The government sets targets which are only met by distorting clinical priorities and leaving patients with long term problems without proper provision. hand over the policy making of the NHS to the clinical staff who are on the front line rather than have on the hoof stop start policies made by ill informed politicians

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
